sub_fields.label: Product type
sub_fields.name: product_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select which product type to display. Each colour's swatch can be set from the individual term page.

sub_fields.label: Headline
sub_fields.name: headline
sub_fields.instructions: Specify a title to appear at the top of this section (optional)

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Specify text to appear to the left (optional)

sub_fields.label: Options
sub_fields.name: options
sub_fields.instructions: Select which product type to display.

sub_fields.label: Hero image
sub_fields.name: hero_image
sub_fields.instructions: Select an image to display above the column content (optional)

sub_fields.message: The title and caption for each image will be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Hero links
sub_fields.name: hero_links
sub_fields.instructions: Specify up to 4 section links or page URLs

sub_fields.message: This block will display an inline searchbar within the page. It will redirect the user to the serach results page.

sub_fields.label: Headline
sub_fields.name: headline
sub_fields.instructions: Specify a title to appear to the left

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Specify a body text to appear to the right. Use <small></small> for reduced font size.

sub_fields.label: Key information
sub_fields.name: key_information
sub_fields.instructions: You may add upto 4 points within one block

sub_fields.message: This component will display a list of retailer's locations along size a locations map. Individual retailer information can be edited from the retailer tab.
This component will display a section link break on the page.
